summary: Seventy-something Don Anselmo, a retired minister, becomes obsessed with owning a motorized wheelchair and fakes infirmity to get it.
cast: José Isbert|Pedro Porcel|José Luis López Vázquez|María Luisa Ponte|Lepe|Ángel Álvarez|Antonio Gavilán|María Isbert|Chus Lampreave|Carmen Santonja|Eusebio Moreno|Tiburcio Cámara|José Luis Heredia|Anteno|Antonio Jiménez Escribano|Jesusa de Castro|Andrea Moro|Fernando Cebreros|Manuel de Agustina|Miguel Muñoz|Antonio Riquelme|José Alvarez|Rafael Azcona|Carlos Saura
title: El cochecito
